profileAlternative.name: Mike Rioux
profileAlternative.headline: Director, Global Sales Enablement at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
I am an exceptionally motivated and determined individual. I have a hard time with not being the best at my position and will strive to improve until I am. I am creative and thrive with fast-paced, on the spot thinking and problem solving. I am a very quick learner and can adapt to any situation with ease.

I hold deep passions for mobile technology, cloud computing and development as well as parallel and distributed computing. I believe that these technologies hold the key to solve future problems.

My objective is to eventually be lead technical architect and technical solution designer solving business, environmental and life changing problems.

aboutAlternative.text:

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
Continuing to build, grow and improve the best Sales Enablement team in the industry for the fastest growing database company on the planet. The teams sole purpose is to improve sales productivity through training, skill sharpening and constant evolution so that the MongoDB sales force can remain best in class.

What we provide:
- Unmatched on-boarding: build industry, product, customer, and sales knowledge/skills
- Sales Leader training and tools to identify, attract, and develop top sales talent
- Role based training and reinforcement that drives mastery level sales execution
- Sales tools and processes that evolve to support sales excellence throughout the sales cycle
- Analytics to drive targeted coaching, predictable outcomes, and development planning

Why we do it:
- Reduce new hire ramp time (all sales roles)
- Increase seller productivity
- Decrease time to recruit the best sales talent
- Increase qualified pipeline
- Improve forecast accuracy
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Principal Solutions Architect
positions.description:
Solutions Architects at MongoDB help their clients harness and realize the power of their data using MongoDB's Intelligent Operational Data Platform. Helping with Real-Time Analytics, Operational Workloads, Mainframe Offload, OLTP, OLAP, IoT, Legacy Modernization and more, SA's at MongoDB help customers shed their legacy debt, reducing TCO and getting to market faster. SA's here will get involved in gathering requirements to help solve the customers technical and business challenges, proving out our technology through Demos, PoCs, PoTs, etc ... We will also help educate the customer on All of what MongoDB has to offer and how it will fit in their overall solution.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Senior Solutions Architect
positions.description: As a Solutions Architect, I help clients realize and harness the potential of MongoDB to power their next generation applications. This includes design, architecture, development and more, both on Cloud and on Premises environments. Ensuring Client success is my utmost priority.

positions.title: IBM - Cloud Data Services and Analytics
positions.description:
Design and maintain Cloud solutions for IBM's Database as a Service offering - Cloudant. Work hand in hand with clients to solve their database infrastructure needs.

Fully manage and monitor numerous Client databases ensuring 99.9999% uptime.

Develop Proof of Concept and Proof of Technology applications with Cloudant as the back end database to help in Pre-Sales engagements with potential clients. These include Browser Based Web applications, iOS/Android Mobile applications and OS Level software.

Help integrate Cloudant solutions with many of IBM's other products, including BigInsights, Netezza and many others.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Senior Consultant and Big Data Developer
positions.description:
Design and develop problem specific Big Data solutions hand in hand with the client. Not only do I deliver a Big Data business solution, but I educate the client to the point where they can become self-sufficient with IBM's Big Data product suite.

Assist in software pre-sales by installing parallel/distributed software on lab clusters. Develop proof of concept and proof of technology solutions to solidify sales.

Develop self paced training materials for other IBMers who want to learn how to use IBM Big Data products.
…
see more

roles.title: Senior Consultant and Big Data Developer

positions.title:
Title
Software Developer
positions.description:
Develop Enhancements and Fix Bugs for IBM's TPFToolkit product. Work with major companies globally to ensure their needs are satisfied.

Functional verification testing for both the TPFToolkit product and the Rational Developer product.

Design and update automated testing tools.
…
see more

positions.title: Graduate Assistant
positions.description: As a Graduate Assistant at Lakehead, I led lectures and lab demonstrations for classes up to 80 students, I marked projects and assignments from 1st to 4th year classes and held office hours for private tutoring.

positions.title: iOS App Developer
positions.description: Developed and tested many iOS Applications both unreleased and currently on the App Store. Worked on both front end UI and back end functionality. Did primary research on new features as they were released from Apple. Left the job only because I was awarded a very prestigious research grant.

given.text:
Although I only worked with Milandeep for a year, I could immediately tell he is both a dedicated, focused and reliable team member. He is a talented developer and problem solver. Although he was only an intern at the time, the team respected his opinion and gave him full time responsibilities which he handled professionally and with confidence. Milandeep is an absolute asset and any team would be lucky to have him.
…
See more
